overview: Internet expert with 20 years track record as an innovative executive developing and managing multi channel online strategies and marketing plans as well as global expansion tactics. Possesses a unique combination of skills and expertise in Affiliate Marketing, SEM, SEO, Email marketing, PR, content and Guerilla tactics, as well as behavioral targeting, segmentation and data analysis. Critical contributor to the success of a number of companies from Fortune 500 icons like the Walt Disney Company to startups like Commission Junction which became leaders in their industries.
